recipe.ingredients: - salmon fillets: 4 (6 ounces each) - olive oil: 2 tablespoons - garlic powder: 1 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/2 teaspoon - salt: 1/2 teaspoon - mango (diced): 1 large - red bell pepper (diced): 1 - red onion (finely chopped): 1/4 cup - cilantro (chopped): 1/4 cup - lime juice: 2 tablespoons - jalapeño (diced, optional): 1
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Salmon: Brush each salmon fillet with olive oil. Season with garlic powder, black pepper, and salt. 2. Grill Salmon: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Place salmon on the grill, skin-side down, and cook for 6-8 minutes on each side or until the fish flakes easily with a fork. 3. Make Mango Salsa: In a medium bowl, mix together diced mango, red bell pepper, red onion, cilantro, lime juice, and jalapeño if using. 4. Serve: Place grilled salmon on a plate and top with a generous scoop of mango salsa.
